elements.name: Open Opp detail page from opp list page.

steps.name: I launch application
I click on applicant link
I select an Opportunity from list
I should be able to see details of that opportunity

elements.name: Opportunity detail page to show all sections and clickable

steps.name: I launch application
I click on applicant link
I select an Opportunity from list
I should see all sections on opportunity detail page
I click firstnext button
I should see section "2. The events we will fund"
I click on next button again
I should see section "3. What events should cover"
I click on previous button
I should see section "2. The events we will fund"

name: GF-1116 Opportunity detail page
description:
As a user 
In order to apply for an opportunity
I should be able to see Opportunity details.

elements.name: Start page to show applicant start link

steps.name: I launch application
I should be able to land on start page
I should see applicant start link

elements.name: Applicant link clickable and open in same page.

steps.name: I launch application
I click on applicant link
I should be able to see opportunity list page

name: GF-1118 Appication start page
description:
As a user 
In order to apply for an opportunity
I should be able to see applicant link to start applying.

elements.name: Overview page to show all questions

steps.name: I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I should see application "Overview" page
I should see all six questions displayed

name: GF1119 Opportunity overview page
description:
As a user 
In order to apply for an opportunity
I should be able see opportuntiy oview page with questions

steps.name: I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I click on event title link on application overview page

elements.name: Verify user able enter free text in title field and able to save.

steps.name: I should be able to enter title "Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest"
I should be able save and Continue
I should return back to overview page.
I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I click on event title link on application overview page

elements.name: Verify user able to enter free text in the title field and able to mark as complete

steps.name: I enter title "Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest"
I should be able select mark as complete checkbox
I should be able save and Continue
I should return back to overview page.
I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I click on event title link on application overview page

elements.name: Verify date time stamp is displayed when mark as complete is clicked

steps.name: I enter title "Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest"
I should be able select mark as complete checkbox
I save and continue
I should be able to see date and time stamp
I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I click on event title link on application overview page

elements.name: Verify word count to show n words remaining when marked as complete

steps.name: I enter title "Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest"
I save and continue
I open event title page again
I should see word count "Words remaining: 15"
I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I click on event title link on application overview page

elements.name: Verify word count to show n words remaining when marked as complete

steps.name: I enter title "Seminar"
I save and continue
I open event title page again
I should see word count "Words remaining: 19"
I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I click on event title link on application overview page

elements.name: Verify word count to show n words remaining when marked as complete

steps.name: I enter title "Seminar on space Technologies"
I save and continue
I open event title page again
I should see word count "Words remaining: 16"
I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I click on event title link on application overview page

elements.name: Verify word count to show n words remaining when marked as complete

steps.name: I enter title "Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test"

arguments.val: Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test

steps.name: I save and continue
I open event title page again
I should see word count "Words remaining: 0"
I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I click on event title link on application overview page

elements.name: Verify word count to show n words remaining when marked as complete

steps.name: I enter title "Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test"

arguments.val: Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test

steps.name: I save and continue
I open event title page again

name: GF-1120 Event title
description:
As a user 
In order to apply for an opportunity
I should be able to enter title and save

elements.name: Verify user able to mark as complete for valid date and duration

steps.name: I am on application overview page
I open provisional date section
I enter valid date
I enter duration "4"
I click mark as complete
I save and continue
I should return back to overview page.

elements.name: Verify user able to save date and duration

steps.name: I open provisional date section
I enter valid date
I enter duration "8"
I save and continue
I should return back to overview page.

elements.name: verify user able to save duration only

steps.name: I open provisional date section
I enter duration "8"
I save and continue
I should return back to overview page.

elements.name: Verify user able to save date only

steps.name: I open provisional date section
I enter valid date
I save and continue
I should return back to overview page.

elements.name: User can save any invalid entry

steps.name: I open provisional date section
I enter invalid date
I enter duration "dd"
I save and continue
I should return back to overview page.

elements.name: Verify user not able mark as complete with invalid month

steps.name: I open provisional date section
I enter invalid date
I enter duration "4"
I click mark as complete
I save and continue on date entry
I should see error message "Must provide a valid date"

elements.name: invalid day

steps.name: I enter invalid date
I enter duration "4"
I click mark as complete
I save and continue on date entry
I should see error message "Must provide a valid date"

elements.name: Negative values in day

steps.name: I enter invalid date
I enter duration "4"
I click mark as complete
I save and continue on date entry
I should see error message "Must provide a valid date"

elements.name: Negative values in month

steps.name: I enter invalid date
I enter duration "4"
I click mark as complete
I save and continue on date entry
I should see error message "Must provide a valid date"

elements.name: Negative values in year

steps.name: I enter invalid date
I enter duration "4"
I click mark as complete
I save and continue on date entry
I should see error message "Must be today or later"

elements.name: Past date cannot be mark as complete

steps.name: I enter invalid date
I enter duration "4"
I click mark as complete
I save and continue on date entry
I should see error message "Must be today or later"

elements.name: Validate error messsage when duration is empty

steps.name: I enter invalid date
I enter duration ""
I click mark as complete
I save and continue on date entry
I should see duration field error "Must be a whole number"

elements.name: Validate error messsage when duration is negative value

steps.name: I enter invalid date
I enter duration "-6"
I click mark as complete
I save and continue on date entry
I should see duration field error "Minimum value is 1"

elements.name: Validate error messsage when duration non numeric

steps.name: I enter invalid date
I enter duration "days"
I click mark as complete
I save and continue on date entry
I should see duration field error "Must be a whole number"

name: GF-1121 Enter start date
description:
As a user 
in order to apply to an opportunity
I should be able to apply by entering start date of my event

elements.name: verify all questions are clickable on application overview.

steps.name: I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I should see application "Overview" page
I should see all six questions are clickable
I should be click event title
navigate to "Event title" page

name: GF-1212 ApplicationOverview
description:
As a user 
In order to apply for an opportunity
I should be able to fill in application details through application overview page

steps.name: I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application

elements.name: Entered words <=20 should be previewable

steps.name: I am on the event tite page
I enter title "Seminar on space technologies autoTest" within required word size limit
I should be able to preview
I should be able to view entered "Seminar on space technologies autoTest"
I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application

elements.name: Entered words <=20 should be previewable

steps.name: I am on the event tite page
I enter title "Seminar one space" within required word size limit
I should be able to preview
I should be able to view entered "Seminar one space"
I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application

elements.name: Entered words >=20 should be previewable

steps.name: I am on the event tite page
I enter title "Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test" outside required word size limit

arguments.val: Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test

steps.name: I should be able to preview
I should be able to view entered "Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test"

arguments.val: Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test test

steps.name: I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application

elements.name: Empty title cannot preview

steps.name: I am on the event tite page
I keep title field empty
I click on preview
I should see error message "Field cannot be empty"

name: GF-1117 Preview title
description:
As a user in order to submit application
I should be able preview entered title.

steps.name: I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I open event objectives page

elements.name: Verify user able enter objectives and save.

steps.name: I should be able to enter event objective "Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest"
I should be able save and Continue
I should return back to overview page.
I am on the opportunity detail page
I click on Make an application
I open event objectives page

elements.name: Verify user able to enter free text in the title field and able to mark as complete

steps.name: I  enter event objective "Seminar on space Technologies AutoTest"
I should be able select mark as complete checkbox
I should be able save and Continue
I should return back to overview page.

name: GF-1122 Event Objective
description:
As a user 
In order to apply for an opportunity
I should be able to enter event object and preview
